T02TD2567E:27a-0: @27a * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2567E:27a-1: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni /
T02TD2567E:27a-2: lhar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas /
T02TD2567E:27b-0: rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig / zhe 'dod thams cad dang @27b bral pa'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i shes pa de kho nal gnas pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD2567E:27b-1: shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang ma bral ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2567E:27b-2: shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2567E:27b-3: rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste /
T02TD2567E:27b-4: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku /
T02TD2567E:27b-5: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02TD2567E:27b-6: rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te /
T02TD2567E:27b-8: dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
